    • Constructor Detail

      • Dragon

        public Dragon(int resistence,
              java.lang.String name,
              int rSpeed,
              int age,
              java.lang.String clas,
              int posx,
              int posy,
              int width,
              int height,
              java.lang.String imgPath,
              int ID)
        Constructor of the Dragon class.
        Parameters:
        resistence - integer with the life of the dragon.
        name - string with the name of the dragon.
        rSpeed - integer with the recharge speed of the dragon.
        age - integer with the age of the dragon.
        clas - string with the class of the dragon.
        posx - integer with the x position of the dragon.
        posy - integer with the y position of the dragon.
        width - integer with the width of the dragon.
        height - integer with the height of the dragon.
        imgPath - string with the path of the image of the dragon.
        ID - integer with the ID of the dragon.
